name: Madewell The Fineloft Crewneck Sweater in Stripe
details: Made from a lightweight and touchable yarn, this ribbed drop-shoulder sweater is striped with a a classic crewneck. A perfect transitional layer you'll throw on for seasons to come.

name: Madewell Ottoman Pullover Crop Sweater
details: The fit? Check. The fabric? Check. This long-sleeve sweater really has it all. Made of structured ottoman knit, it hugs the body in the most flattering way and looks oh-so-good paired with our denim.

name: Madewell SPLITS59™ Airweight High-Waist Skort
details: Los Angeles-based Splits59™ makes serious activewear that's seriously gym-selfie-friendly. Crafted of its ultraluxe AirWeight fabric, this high-waisted skort has a wide waistband and chafe-free flatlock seams.

name: Madewell Loup Paloma Romper
details: This NYC brand is all about the perfect fit with ease—their curve-friendly pants have a cult following(!) Designed with colorful mini florals, the Paloma is a lightweight summer romper with a removable self-tie belt, zip-up front and side-seam pockets.

name: Madewell The Rosedale Blazer in Plaid
details: Crafted of recycled Italian fabric in a classic plaid, this double-breasted blazer belongs to a supercute three-piece set. Finished with structured shoulder pads and plenty of pockets, nab the matching midi skirt and vest to complete the look.

name: Madewell Superbrushed Pull-On Jumpsuit
details: The fabric: made with eco-friendly TENCEL™ modal and polyester recycled from plastic bottles, our MWL Superbrushed terry is ridiculously soft and fleece-y against the skin. The fit: a layering-friendly pull-on jumpsuit with handy patch pockets and subtly tapered wide legs.

name: Madewell Lightestspun Cover-Up Shorts
details: Made of a featherweight version of our supersoft Lightspun double-layered cotton gauze, these cover-up shorts have breezy overlapping sides that open up a bit as you walk. Wear it as a bikini cover-up or as a set with the matching top.

name: Madewell Retro High-Waisted Bikini Bottom in Brushstroke Monstera
details: Our Madewell Second Wave swim collection has a built-in feel-good factor—the fabric was made from recycled material. Ready to pair with the matching top, this tropical-printed retro bikini bottom has a flattering high waist and just-right back coverage. With sizes running from XXS to 3X, it's an "everyone needs it" kinda deal.

name: Madewell Denim Snap-Front Long Vest in Sedgwick Wash
details: A biker-chic piece in our forever favorite fabric, this denim vest has snaps all down the front. Its longer length makes it the perfect layering piece to throw-on over anything, from dresses to sweaters to jackets.

name: Madewell The Drapey Tie-Waist Blazer
details: Is it a blazer? Is it a robe? Why not both. Made of supersoft (and eco-friendly) modal, this drapey style has an easy tie waist and low-key shoulder pads to realllyyy up the cool factor.

name: Madewell The Curvy Garment-Dyed '90s Straight Cargo Pant
details: Designed for an hourglass shape (see: narrower high waist with a contoured band, a longer rise and a little extra room at the hips and thighs), these '90s-inspired pants come in garment-dyed herringbone fabric with a broken-in feel. Its body-skimming fit, slouchy straight legs and handy pockets make them the definition of laid-back chic.
length: Your height: 5’4” to 5’8”. Your inseam (top of inner thigh to floor): 30” to 32”.

name: Madewell Rumpled Terry Blazer
details: Coming in a rumpled terry with a double-gauze feel, this single-breasted blazer has all the classic deets—a notched collar and flap front pockets. Throw on the matching pants for a coordinated look.

name: Madewell The Rosedale Blazer in Crepe
details: Crafted of a recycled (and wrinkle-resistant) washed crepe fabric, this double-breasted blazer is ideal for your next work trip or just the morning commute. Finished with structured shoulder pads and plenty of pockets, nab the matching pants to complete the look.

name: Madewell The Rosedale High-Rise Straight Pant in Crepe
details: Crafted of recycled, wrinkle-resistant easygoing crepe, these high-rise pants are made for travel (even if it's just to the office in the morning). Pleated in front with easy straight legs, they're effortlessly cool with the matching blazer.

name: Madewell Girlfriend Collective Cami Unitard
details: Girlfriend Collective transforms plastic waste into luxurious, breathable and well-fitting activewear. Made of comfy, compressive fabric recycled from 36 water bottles, this full-length unitard has adjustable cami straps.

name: Madewell Knit Biker Unitard: Botanical Dye Edition
details: The fabric: lightweight cotton jersey with a touch of comfy stretch in an eco-friendly (a.k.a. naturally sourced and uses about 40 percent less water than traditional dyeing) botanical dye. The fit: like a combo of a cami and our gold-standard knit biker shorts, this unitard has a built-in shelf bra so you can be out the door justlikethat.

name: Madewell Knit Biker Unitard
details: The fabric: lightweight cotton jersey with a touch of comfy stretch. The fit: like a combo of a cami and our gold-standard knit biker shorts, this one-piece unitard has a built-in shelf bra so you can be out the door justlikethat.

name: Madewell Plus Long-Sleeve Tie-Waist Fatigue Jumpsuit
details: Like an army-surplus store find that's made to fit you, this relaxed-fit jumpsuit has a removable waist tie and flap pockets. A garment-dyed wash adds to the lived-in, vintage-inspired vibe.

name: Madewell Lucie Tie-Back Long-Sleeve Jumpsuit in Carmine Floral
details: The newest member of our best-selling Lucie fam, this long-sleeve jumpsuit has a square neck and swishy legs. Like a fancy maxi dress with a comfy secret, it has a sexy tie-back and comes in a festive floral print.

details: We love a three-fer, especially in 100 percent lightweight linen. This tank/short combo buttons together into the perfect summer romper with a square neckline and smocked back.

name: Madewell Modular Sleeveless Romper
details: We love a three-fer, especially in cotton dobby seersucker. This tank/short combo buttons together into the perfect summer romper with a square neckline and smocked back.

details: Coming in a sustainable linen blend with stacked buttons down the front, this breezy romper has an open resort collar and adjustable drawstring to cinch you in around the waist. Toss it in your suitcase for the easiest one-and-done vacay look.

details: Made of lightweight and textural cotton seersucker, this short-sleeve romper has side cutouts and a keyhole back. With an easy fit, it's perfect for popping on over your swimsuit for an effortless beach-to-dinner vibe.

details: Coming in airy 100 percent linen with stacked buttons down the front, this breezy romper has an open resort collar and adjustable drawstring to cinch you in around the waist. Toss it in your suitcase for the easiest one-and-done vacay look.

name: Madewell Plus Sleeveless Wide-Leg Jumpsuit in 100% Linen
details: Made of 100 percent lightweight linen, this pull-on jumpsuit has a button-front bodice with seaming beneath the bust, flowy wide legs and best of all, pockets. So cute, so easy.

details: Made of 100 percent lightweight linen, this pull-on jumpsuit has a button-front bodice with seaming beneath the bust, flowy wide legs and best of all, pockets. So cute, so easy.

details: Made of our (Re)generative chino in transitional regenerative cotton, this wide-leg jumpsuit has so many pretty details like trapunto stitching at the straps, pleats at the bodice and smocking at the peekaboo back.

details: Made of supersoft and lightweight double-layered cotton gauze, this pull-on jumpsuit has straps you can wear on or off the shoulder and easy wide legs. Lightweight and layerable, it's the ideal swimsuit cover-up.

name: Madewell 100% Linen Tie-Waist Wide-Leg Jumpsuit

details: With classic seaming details and an easy zip front, this denim jumpsuit is a must-add to your indigo collection. Its patch pockets and relaxed legs give us overall vibes, but in an elevated kind of way.

details: Made of our (Re)generative chino in transitional regenerative cotton, this elevated take on a classic jumpsuit has a cinched tie-front waist, tapered legs and cool seaming throughout. Throw it on with comfy sneaks and you're out the door.

name: Madewell Seamless Halter Biker Unitard
details: The fabric: supersoft and buttery against the skin, our ribbed MWL Seamless has serious bounce-back power (and is made with recycled nylon). The fit: like a combo of a halter tank and seamed biker shorts, this one-piece unitard has a built-in shelf bra so you can be out the door justlikethat.
